marketName: UCL: Slavia Praha vs Barcelona - Total Cards
question: How many total cards (yellow + red) will be shown in the Slavia Praha vs Barcelona match?
description: Predict the total number of cards (yellow and red combined) for both teams in the UEFA Champions League match between Slavia Praha and Barcelona on January 21, 2026 at 8:00 PM UTC.
resolutionCriteria:
This market resolves based on the total number of cards (yellow and red combined) shown to both teams during the UEFA Champions League match between Slavia Praha and Barcelona.

Resolution Source: Google match statistics
Match Time: January 21, 2026 at 8:00 PM UTC
Bidding Deadline: January 21, 2026 at 9:45 PM UTC
Resolution Time: January 21, 2026 at 10:30 PM UTC

Counting Rules:
- Yellow cards from both teams count as 1 each
- Red cards from both teams count as 1 each
- Second yellow leading to red counts as 2 cards total
